description:
The town of Sainan is bustling as a fireworks show approaches. Nana sets out with Mea, and Lala with Haruna and her friends, to the shrine to enjoy the festival, while Momo spends the time alone with Rito and feels her love for him surface again. Then Mikan, who should have been with Tearju, comes running to Rito in a panic...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Summer Festival: Beginning of the Festival
